  1. from cms.menu_bases import CMSAttachMenu
  2. from cms.test_utils.project.sampleapp.models import Category
  3. from django.core.urlresolvers import reverse, NoReverseMatch
  4. from django.utils.translation import ugettext_lazy as _
  5. from menus.base import Menu, NavigationNode
  6. from menus.menu_pool import menu_pool
  8. class SampleAppMenu(Menu):
  10. def get_nodes(self, request):
  11. nodes = []
  12. for cat in Category.objects.all():
  13. n = NavigationNode(cat.name, cat.get_absolute_url(), cat.pk, cat.parent_id, "sampleapp")
  14. nodes.append(n)
  15. try:
  16. n = NavigationNode(_('sample root page'), reverse('sample-root'), 1)
  17. n2 = NavigationNode(_('sample settings page'), reverse('sample-settings'), 2)
  18. n3 = NavigationNode(_('sample account page'), reverse('sample-account'), 3)
  19. n4 = NavigationNode(_('sample my profile page'), reverse('sample-profile'), 4, 3)
  20. nodes.append(n)
  21. nodes.append(n2)
  22. nodes.append(n3)
  23. nodes.append(n4)
  24. except NoReverseMatch:
  25. pass
  26. return nodes
  28. menu_pool.register_menu(SampleAppMenu)
  30. class StaticMenu(CMSAttachMenu):
  31. name = _("Static Menu")
  32. def get_nodes(self, request):
  33. nodes = []
  34. n = NavigationNode('static root page', "/fresh/", 1)
  35. n2 = NavigationNode('static settings page', "/bye/", 2)
  36. n3 = NavigationNode('static account page', "/hello/", 3)
  37. n4 = NavigationNode('static my profile page', "/hello/world/", 4, 3)
  38. nodes.append(n)
  39. nodes.append(n2)
  40. nodes.append(n3)
  41. nodes.append(n4)
  42. return nodes
  44. menu_pool.register_menu(StaticMenu)
  46. class StaticMenu2(CMSAttachMenu):
  47. name = _("Static Menu2")
  48. def get_nodes(self, request):
  49. nodes = []
  50. n = NavigationNode('static2 root page', "/fresh/", 1)
